name: gingerjs-core
description: GingerJS, a secure, batteries included, feature rich, multi-database, enterprise ready application server, co-authored by a human architect and a Generative AI partner.

scripts.docs: jsdoc -c .jsdoc.json && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/concepts.md --output ./docs/api/docs/concepts.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/server-config.md --output ./docs/api/docs/server-config.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/app-structure.md --output ./docs/api/docs/app-structure.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/server-script.md --output ./docs/api/docs/server-script.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/features.md --output ./docs/api/docs/features.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/roadmap.md --output ./docs/api/docs/roadmap.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/CONTRIBUTING.md --output ./docs/api/docs/CONTRIBUTING.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md --output ./docs/api/docs/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/packaging-guide.md --output ./docs/api/docs/packaging-guide.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/gingerjs-cli.md --output ./docs/api/docs/gingerjs-cli.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/ai-disclaimer.md --output ./docs/api/docs/ai-disclaimer.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/app-developer-guide.md --output ./docs/api/docs/app-developer-guide.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/glade-admin.md --output ./docs/api/docs/glade-admin.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/permissions-guide.md --output ./docs/api/docs/permissions-guide.html && markdown-to-html --source ./docs/gstore-hosting-guide.md --output ./docs/api/docs/gstore-hosting-guide.html
scripts.contribute: echo "Thank you for your interest! Please see CONTRIBUTING.md for our unique Human-AI collaborative development guidelines."

author: Google Gemini (Developer, Test Writer, Tech Writer), Vignesh Swaminathan (Architect, Tester, Reviewer)

genai.workflow: See ai-disclaimer.md for details on the human-AI collaborative process.
